Job Title: AI at Lilly Product Manager and Prompt Engineer

Location: Indianapolis, IN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
At Lilly, we unite caring with discovery to make life better for people around the world. We are a global healthcare leader headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana. Our employees around the world work to discover and bring life-changing medicines to those who need them, improve the understanding and management of disease, and give back to our communities through philanthropy and volunteerism. We give our best effort to our work, and we put people first. We’re looking for people who are determined to make life better for people around the world.

Come shape the future of our industry by bringing Artificial Intelligence capabilities to life!

Digital Core Tech@Lilly is actively looking for an AI at Lilly Product Manager and Prompt Engineer to lead technology teams at the intersection of agile methodologies and artificial intelligence. We are in search of an extraordinary individual to embrace the dual role of Agile Product Manager and Prompt Engineer. This role is ideal for those with a deep passion for the transformative power of AI and a solid commitment to agile principles aimed at bringing innovative solutions to life swiftly and efficiently.

As a Product Manager and Prompt Engineer, you will lead technology teams building solutions that improve performance and reliability of processes and systems in pharma. Are you passionate about artificial intelligence and the impact it can have across an entire industry? Are you a change agent who can influence organizations? If so, bring YOUR skills and talents to Lilly where you’ll have the chance to create an impact on the lives of patients!

What You'll Be Doing

Product Leadership and Agile AI Strategy: Own multiple products and capabilities holistically to ensure they meet expected business outcomes. Lead multidisciplinary teams to infuse AI innovations into our capabilities and solutions, aligning with overarching business objectives and user requirements via user stories and acceptance criteria. Spearhead the strategic integration of AI capabilities into our solutions, leveraging SAFe methodologies to guarantee agile and effective rollouts.

Prompt Engineering Mastery: Engineer and refine AI prompts that direct generative models to achieve specific outcomes, requiring a technical grasp of AI, inventive prompt crafting, and optimization based on an established business process context.

Solution Development and Agile Mindset: Foster strong partnerships with internal and external stakeholders and product teams across our company and industry to weave AI technologies into our solutions, upholding expectations for quality in delivered solutions. Advocate for agile development processes, nurturing an ecosystem of quick cycles and constructive feedback.

Quality Assurance and Agile Excellence: Uphold quality in AI-generated content and agile project management by instituting robust testing protocols, continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) practices, and data-driven performance review.

Innovation, Investigation, and Ethical Governance: Remain at the forefront of AI and agile methodology innovations. Champion the integration of innovative technologies and practices to enrich our capability suite, all while adhering to ethical AI development principles and privacy mandates.

How You Will Succeed

Critical Thinking and Problem Solving: Employ analytical skills to dissect complex challenges, crafting innovative solutions that leverage AI and agile principles.

Technical Agility: Combine your technical expertise in AI with an agile mindset to navigate the rapid development and iteration of products, demonstrating flexibility and adaptability in response to shifting priorities and new information.

Effective Communication: Articulate complex AI and agile concepts in a clear, persuasive manner to diverse audiences, fostering understanding and alignment across technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Leadership and Influence: Guide and inspire cross-functional teams towards a shared vision, leveraging your leadership skills to cultivate an environment of collaboration, innovation, and high performance.

Continuous Learning: Maintain a relentless pursuit of knowledge in the ever-evolving fields of AI and agile methodologies, ensuring our strategies and practices remain at the cutting edge.

What You Should Bring

Blended Expertise in AI and Agile: Demonstrated experience in managing AI product development within a SAFe or similar agile framework. Understanding of generative AI technologies and their application in crafting innovative solutions.

Strategic Vision and Technical Acumen: The ability to convey a compelling strategic vision for AI-powered products, coupled with the technical expertise to oversee AI prompt engineering and product development processes.

Leadership and Collaborative Skills: Proven leadership capabilities with a track record of steering cross-functional teams. Exceptional collaboration and communication skills to effectively engage with various stakeholders and drive project success.

Innovative Thinking and Problem-Solving: A zest for innovation and a creative approach to problem-solving. An openness to experimenting with novel ideas and methodologies in AI application development.

Ethical Mindset and Continuous Learning: A commitment to ethical AI practices and a continuous learning ethos. A keen interest in staying abreast of the latest developments in AI research, agile methodologies, and industry best practices.

Your Basic Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, mathematics, or a related field.5+ years of technology program leadership experience with expertise in industry standard methodologies2+ years of experience in similar product leadership roles with technology, including experience with enterprise technology programs


Additional Preferences

Scaled Agile, Agile, and Scrum CertificationsPrompt engineering experience and educationPrevious technical program team leadership experience2+ years of experience in working with AI technologies and tools, such as natural language processing (NLP), generative AI (LLMs,) machine learning algorithms, deep learning, etc.


Additional Information

Position located in Indianapolis, Indiana working in a hybrid model. Remote work within the US may be considered.Travel may be required periodically.


Eli Lilly and Company, Lilly USA, LLC and our wholly owned subsidiaries (collectively “Lilly”) are committed to help individuals with disabilities to participate in the workforce and ensure equal opportunity to compete for jobs. If you require an accommodation to submit a resume for positions at Lilly, please email Lilly Human Resources ( Lilly_Recruiting_Compliance@lists.lilly.com ) for further assistance. Please note This email address is intended for use only to request an accommodation as part of the application process. Any other correspondence will not receive a response.

Lilly is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

Our employee resource groups (ERGs) offer strong support networks for their members and help our company develop talented individuals for future leadership roles. Our current groups include: Africa, Middle East, Central Asia Network, African American Network, Chinese Culture Network, Early Career Professionals, Japanese International Leadership Network (JILN), Lilly India Network, Organization of Latinos at Lilly, PRIDE (LGBTQ + Allies), Veterans Leadership Network, Women’s Network, Working and Living with Disabilities. Learn more about all of our groups.

#WeAreLilly

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
